title: Prototyping and testing nuget build reconstruction
body:
Idea by @baronfel

## Motivation

#8398 needs experimentation with nuget build reconstruction options - and evaluating those on top N nugets (https://www.nuget.org/stats, let's shoot for top 100)

## Expected outputs
- [not production level quality] harness for running through top N nuget packages, run the injected build reconstruction code and evaluating results
- Stats and suggestion based on results for 2 main build reconstruction techniques:
  - [x] #8511
  - [x] #8512

nodes.body:
Implementation: https://github.com/JanKrivanek/PackagesSandbox/tree/main/prototypes/NugetExperiments
Results summarization: [OneNote [internal]](https://microsofteur-my.sharepoint.com/personal/jankrivanek_microsoft_com/_layouts/15/Doc.aspx?sourcedoc={88023df9-4c0e-440e-9b92-c1695fc024d8}&action=edit&wd=target%28Packages%20Sourcing.one%7Cf25703f3-c737-49ad-ab37-51008e06694e%2FInvestigation%20notes%7Ca84acc2a-d6f5-487a-88c6-8fc8de75f29c%2F%29&wdorigin=703)
